snippet.title: Call of Mini Sniper Android Gameplay [1080p/60fps]
snippet.description:
Discover Call of Mini-Sniper, a FPS where you play as an expert sniper who's trying to survive the zombie apocalypse and save as many civilians as possible.

SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE HD VIDEOS → https://goo.gl/Pz1CBK

Download | https://call-of-mini-sniper.en.uptodown.com/android?utm_source=youtube.com&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=traffic_ac
Google play | https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.trinitigame.callofminisnipernew

The objective in all the scenarios is the same: last as long as you can. To do so, keep the zombies out of the safe zone, because if they enter it, you lose the game. You can also lose the game by accidentally killing civilians. If you kill three of them, you're done.

Call of Mini-Sniper is a fun action game with a wide variety of weapons and zombies for you to kill. As you advance in the game, the zombies only get more gruesome, and you may even come across a giant zombie or two.

More games➡ https://en.uptodown.com/android?utm_source=youtube.com&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=traffic_ac
Telegram➡ https://t.me/uptodown_com
Twitter (english)➡ https://twitter.com/uptodown_en
Twitter (spanish)➡ https://twitter.com/uptodown

#callofmini #android #androidgames #callofminisniper
